alert.note: Alert for Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:43PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gilpin and eastern Clear Creek Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 443 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Georgetown, or 37 miles west of Denver, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Idaho Springs, Georgetown, Central City, Empire, Silver Plume, Black Hawk, Blue Valley, Dumont, Echo Lake, Brookvale and Aspen Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet
